scripts.css: node-sass dashboard/sass/style.scss dashboard/sass/style.css --output-style expanded --source-map true && postcss -r dashboard/sass/style.css
scripts.live: node-sass dashboard/sass/style.scss dashboard/sass/style.css --output-style compressed --source-map true && postcss -r dashboard/sass/style.css
scripts.compile: npm run css && node-sass dashboard/sass/style.scss dashboard/sass/style.css --recursive --watch --output-style expanded && postcss -r dashboard/sass/style.css
